ID: 2105
Title: [Bug]: 0的结果表示 || [Bug]: The result of 0 indicates
Description:
**Describe the bug**
您好，我们发现对于字符串类型的整数进行算术运算时，会出现结果为0，但表示为-0的情况
SELECT '0'/-4      expected: 0   actual: -0
SELECT mod('-12', -4) expected: 0   actual: -0

**Environment**
<!-- Environment Details sometimes important -->
- OS Version and CPU Arch(`uname -a`):
Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.4.0-150-generic x86_64)  

- OB Version(`LD_LIBRARY_PATH=../lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ./observer -V`):
 所有oceanbase版本


<!--This is a translation content dividing line, the content below is generated by machine, please do not modify the content below-->
---
**Describe the bug**
Hello, we found that when performing arithmetic operations on string-type integers, the result will be 0, but it will be expressed as -0.
SELECT '0'/-4 expected: 0 actual: -0
SELECT mod('-12', -4) expected: 0 actual: -0

**Environment**
<!-- Environment Details sometimes important -->
- OS Version and CPU Arch(`uname -a`):
Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.4.0-150-generic x86_64)

- OB Version(`LD_LIBRARY_PATH=../lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ./observer -V`):
 All oceanbase versions
